video_prompt: Giant pineapple's spigot dispenses juice, filling a glass. Tiny figures move around the base, one near a spill, another interacting with a smaller drink. Sunlight shifts across a blurred outdoor background.
image_prompt: A giant pineapple dispensing juice, with tiny human figures interacting with it. High-angle, full shot, whimsical and surreal. Warm, natural lighting, blurred outdoor background with bokeh.
refined_video_prompt: Juice flows, progressively filling a glass. Miniature figures animate around the base; one reacts to a spreading liquid, another actively interacts with a smaller beverage. Sunlight dynamically shifts across the blurred outdoor background.
